name: 卡罗琳·阿布拉姆斯
name_full: 卡罗琳·阿布拉姆斯 Caroline Elle Abrams

last_movies.title: 最后的冒险：《怪奇物语》第五季幕后

introduction: Caroline Elle Abrams began her acting career at the age of five, performing in theater and commercials in South Florida. She then transitioned into film and TV, landing her first lead role in JUST DEAL WITH IT, a comedic drama where she portrayed CHARLIE, a gender-confused pre-teen navigating adolescence. Caroline went on to star as KYLIE in the Lionsgate family adventure R.A.D.A.R. THE ADVENTURES OF THE BIONIC DOG and had a guest star role as NOA in the Apple TV+ series ME. Caroline most recently joined the cast of NETFLIX STRANGER THINGS season 5 as TINA TURNBOW.
